reviewText: Warp into the Mushroom Kingdom to rescue Princess Toadstool from the evil King Koopa and his 7 menacing Koopa Kids. 6 great episodes from the Adventures Of Super Mario Bros. 3 of Mario & Luigi battling the Koopas in these fun filled episodes. Great for all those classic Nintendo fans out there. It also has the last 2 episodes (The Venice Menace & Super Koopa) which does not have the blank bloops in them that are in the Complete Series DVD.
Title: N/A

reviewText: If your tired of the Gray Patches in Venice Menace and Super Koopa Buy this DVD for just these episodes since they have no gray patches at all!
summary: Attention All Mario 3 Complete Set Buyers

reviewText: Our nine year old loves Mario. This movie was part of a gift with some others. He loves watching them and it gives a bit more story background to the video games.
